targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("messages-read"), 1s) AS "iptracker messages read per second" FROM "nom-policy-manager.iptracker.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

panels.title: IP Tracker Messages Read per Second

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("messages-applied"), 1s) AS "iptracker messages applied per second" FROM "nom-policy-manager.iptracker.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

panels.title: IP Tracker Messages Applied per Second

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("addresses.added"), 1s) AS "added" FROM "nom-policy-manager.iptracker.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("addresses.failed-adds"), 1s) AS "failed-add" FROM "nom-policy-manager.iptracker.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("messages-dropped"), 1s) AS "iptracker messages dropped per second" FROM "nom-policy-manager.iptracker.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

panels.title: IP Tracker Messages Dropped per Second

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("addresses.failed-deletes"), 1s) AS "failed-delete" FROM "nom-policy-manager.iptracker.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

rows.title: Messages Dropped and Failed Deletes (should stay at 0)

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("request-count"), 1s) AS "rps" FROM "nom-policy-manager.api.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

panels.title: Policy Manager API Request Rate

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("cpu-time"), 1s) AS "pm-cpu" FROM "nom-policy-manager.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

panels.title: Policy Manager CPU Time per Second

targets.query: SELECT max("heap-memory-used") AS "memory" FROM "nom-policy-manager.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

panels.title: Policy Manager Heap Memory Used

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("value")) AS "iptracker" FROM "nom-policy-manager.server.usage" WHERE "thread-name" =~ /iptracker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("value")) AS "http-api" FROM "nom-policy-manager.server.usage" WHERE "thread-name" =~ /http-api/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("value")) AS "list-worker" FROM "nom-policy-manager.server.usage" WHERE "thread-name" =~ /list-worker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("value")) AS "telemetry" FROM "nom-policy-manager.server.usage" WHERE "thread-name" =~ /(?i)telemetry/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("value")) AS "cc-server" FROM "nom-policy-manager.server.usage" WHERE "thread-name" =~ /cc-server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("value")) AS "connection-pool-manager" FROM "nom-policy-manager.server.usage" WHERE "thread-name" =~ /ConnectionPoolManager/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("value")) AS "kafka" FROM "nom-policy-manager.server.usage" WHERE "thread-name" =~ /(?i)kafka/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

panels.title: Policy Manager CPU by thread-group

rows.title: Policy Manager CPU by thread-group (currently broken)

targets.query: SELECT min("system-cpu-load") * 1000 AS "system-cpu-load" FROM "nom-policy-manager.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)
SELECT min("process-cpu-load") * 1000 AS "process-cpu-load" FROM "nom-policy-manager.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

panels.title: Policy Manager CPU Load

targets.query: SELECT SUM("p-r") AS "received" FROM( SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("statistics.packets-received"), 1s) AS "p-r" FROM "iptracker.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT SUM("p-d") AS "dropped" FROM( SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("statistics.packets-dropped"), 1s) AS "p-d" FROM "iptracker.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT SUM("p-s-t-k") AS "sent-to-kafka" FROM( SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("statistics.packets-sent-to-kafka"), 1s) AS "p-s-t-k" FROM "iptracker.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT SUM("p-s-t-r-s") AS "sent-to-radius-server" FROM( SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("statistics.packets-sent-to-radius-server"), 1s) AS "p-s-t-r-s" FROM "iptracker.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

panels.title: Aggregate IP Tracker Packet Rates

targets.query: SELECT SUM("r-s") AS "starts" FROM( SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("statistics.radius.starts"), 1s) AS "r-s" FROM "iptracker.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT SUM("r-s") AS "stops" FROM( SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("statistics.radius.stops"), 1s) AS "r-s" FROM "iptracker.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT SUM("r-i-u") AS "interim-updates" FROM( SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("statistics.radius.interim-updates"), 1s) AS "r-i-u" FROM "iptracker.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

panels.title: Aggregate IP Tracker Radius Message Rates

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("messages-read"), 1s) AS "iptracker messages read per second" FROM "nom-policy-manager.iptracker.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

SELECT SUM("p-s-t-k") AS "sent-to-kafka" FROM( SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("statistics.packets-sent-to-kafka"), 1s) AS "p-s-t-k" FROM "iptracker.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node-id" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

panels.title: IP Tracker Relay Messages Sent vs. IP Tracker Agent (PM) Messages Read

targets.query: select max(gap) from (select elapsed("reset-time", 1s) as gap from "nom-policy-manager.server.statistics") WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

panels.title: Gap Between Policy Manager Telemetry Messages

targets.query: SELECT max("num-cpus") AS "num-cpus", "version" FROM "iptracker.server.information" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host-name","node-id"

panels.title: IP Tracker Relay Hosts Mapping Table

rows.title: IP Tracker Relay Hosts Mapping Table

targets.query: SELECT derivative(min("heap-memory-used"), 1s) AS "memory-rate" FROM "nom-policy-manager.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

panels.title: Policy Manager Memory Change Rate

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("gc-time"), 1s) AS "garbage-collection-time" FROM "nom-policy-manager.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)
